Description:
High school diploma or equivalent; a degree in business administration or a related field is a plus.
Previous experience in pricing, sales support, or a related role is preferred.
Strong analytical skills and the ability to work with numbers and data effectively.
Proficiency in using spreadsheet software (e.g., Microsoft Excel) and pricing tools.
Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills to manage multiple pricing requests
simultaneously.
Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, to effectively interact with internal teams and customers.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
Knowledge of the relocation industry and familiarity with pricing strategies is desirable but not mandatory.Job Details
